title: Seizing the Moment: Can Matteo Jorgenson Write Tour of Flanders History?
content:
Thrust into the leadership role at injury-plagued Visma-Lease a Bike, on-form American is the ultimate outsider: 'There is no lack of motivation.'

Read the full article at Seizing the Moment: Can Matteo Jorgenson Write Tour of Flanders History? on Velo.
author: ahood
